item.title: Version 1.2.16
item.description:
What's New

Fix spell check restore when editing mid-word after cursor movement

  • Add cursorMovedSinceReset flag to VNEngine to track cursor movements
  • Implement resetWithCursorMoved() method to set cursor moved flag
  • Skip spell check restore logic when cursor was moved (prevents incorrect restoration when editing middle of existing words)
  • Improve word break handling for macros with special characters
  • Fix macro processing for characters like @ in macros (e.g., you@)
  • Update cursor movement key handling to use new resetWithCursorMoved()
  • Bump version to 1.2.16
